## WorkspaceSvg.setScale() method

Set the workspace's zoom factor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setScale(newScale: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newScale | number | Zoom factor. Units: (pixels / workspaceUnit). |

**Returns:**

void
